messages.title: Julian Huppert MP: our local champion for the NHS
messages.content: Extra funds for local services. Julian Huppert has secured £500 million more NHS funding for our area.

messages.title: Julian wins £29m for pupils
messages.content: New money to help address school places shortfall.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Secured £500 million more NHS funding for our area.
Won £29 million to help address the school places shortfall.
Fixing Labour's economic mess, growing the economy, and reducing unemployment.

mentions.candidate: Julian Huppert has secured £500 million more NHS funding for our area.

issues.economy: Fixing Labour's economic mess, growing the economy, and reducing unemployment.
issues.education: Julian wins £29 million to help address the school places shortfall.
issues.health: Julian Huppert has secured £500 million more NHS funding for our area.

housing.content: Local Lib Dems fighting commuter parking concerns. Shahida & Ian work to combat new station parking chaos.

politicalExperience.achievements: Secured £500 million more NHS funding, won £29 million for pupils

endorsements.endorsement: I used to vote Labour, but Julian's NHS record beats them hands down.

images.caption: Julian Huppert MP with constituents and healthcare professionals discussing NHS funding.
